casebody.data:
Sigmund Oppenheimer, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 9, 1891. Appeal from a judgment entered on findings and decision of a judge on a trial at special term, before the court without a jury. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
